title: Show 81 - Aaron Bastani
itunes:title: Show 81 - Aaron Bastani
itunes:subtitle: Aaron Bastani is the founder of left-wing websiteâ€¦
description:
Aaron Bastani is the founder of left-wing website Novara Media and author of the forthcoming book 'Luxury Automated Communism Now!'. A prominent and passionate supporter of Jeremy Corbyn, he and Matt discuss the future of the economy, dieting, Brexit, poppies and WhatsApp groups. Buy tickets to Matt's fully updated 'Brexit Through the Gift Shop': https://www.southbankcentre.co.uk/whats-on/133159-brexit-through-gift-shop-matt-forde-2018 Buy tickets to the Political Party Christmas Specials: https://leicestersquaretheatre.ticketsolve.com/shows/873589775 Follow Aaron on Twitter: @AaronBastani Pre-order 'Fully Automated Luxury Communism Now' here: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Fully-Automated-Luxury-Communism-Manifesto/dp/1786632624/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1541506954&sr=8-1&keywords=bastani Visit Novara Media: https://novaramedia.com/

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
